summary: Simple, correct fix that adds a valid markdown library version. The change addresses the build failure by using markdown==3.7 instead of the non-existent 3.7.1 version.

issues.description: A newer version (3.8) of the markdown package is available
issues.suggestion: Consider using markdown==3.8 for the latest features and fixes, though 3.7 is perfectly acceptable

positives: Correctly identifies and fixes the invalid version issue
Uses a verified, available version from PyPI
Follows the existing formatting pattern in the requirements file with proper comment
Minimal, focused change that solves the specific problem
